title: Trump defends, praises and wishes Porter well
text:
Trump defends, praises and wishes Porter well 12:50am IST - 01:19 
U.S. President Donald Trump says former White House aide Rob Porter who's been accused of domestic abuse did a ''wonderful job'' when he was working in his administration. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. President Donald Trump says former White House aide Rob Porter who's been accused of domestic abuse did a "wonderful job" when he was working in his administration.
